thm wlimeq12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c3), crab(hs0, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c2, c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, c0)))), crab(hs0, c3, wa(wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c3, c3, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0)), c3, c1)))), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, c2, c3, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c2, c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, c0))), wa(wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c3, c3, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0)), c3, c1))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c2, c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, c0)), wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c3, c3, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0)), c3, c1)))
  neeq2d(cv(hs0), cinf(c2, c2, c0), cinf(c3, c3, c1), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  infeq123d(c2, c2, c0, c3, c3, c1, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, c0), csup(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0)), c3, c1), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  supeq123d(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, c0, cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0)), c3, c1, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  mp3an3(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  equid(hs0)
  predeq123(c0, c1, c2, c3, cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  simpr(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  simpl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  df-wlim(hs0, c0, c2)
  df-wlim(hs0, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm wlimeq12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 = c1 ‚àß c2 = c3)‚Üí WLim(c0, c2)= WLim(c1, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(WLim(c0, c2), WLim(c1, c3), { hs0 ‚àà c2 |(hs0 ‚â† inf(c2, c2, c0)‚àß hs0 = sup(Pred(c0, c2, hs0), c2, c0))}, { hs0 ‚àà c3 |(hs0 ‚â† inf(c3, c3, c1)‚àß hs0 = sup(Pred(c1, c3, hs0), c3, c1))}, (c0 = c1 ‚àß c2 = c3))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, c2, c3, (c0 = c1 ‚àß c2 = c3), (hs0 ‚â† inf(c2, c2, c0)‚àß hs0 = sup(Pred(c0, c2, hs0), c2, c0)), (hs0 ‚â† inf(c3, c3, c1)‚àß hs0 = sup(Pred(c1, c3, hs0), c3, c1)))
  anbi12d((c0 = c1 ‚àß c2 = c3), hs0 ‚â† inf(c2, c2, c0), hs0 = sup(Pred(c0, c2, hs0), c2, c0), hs0 ‚â† inf(c3, c3, c1), hs0 = sup(Pred(c1, c3, hs0), c3, c1))
  neeq2d(hs0, inf(c2, c2, c0), inf(c3, c3, c1), (c0 = c1 ‚àß c2 = c3))
  infeq123d(c2, c2, c0, c3, c3, c1, (c0 = c1 ‚àß c2 = c3))
  eqeq2d(hs0, sup(Pred(c0, c2, hs0), c2, c0), sup(Pred(c1, c3, hs0), c3, c1), (c0 = c1 ‚àß c2 = c3))
  supeq123d(Pred(c0, c2, hs0), c2, c0, Pred(c1, c3, hs0), c3, c1, (c0 = c1 ‚àß c2 = c3))
  mp3an3(c0 = c1, c2 = c3, Pred(c0, c2, hs0)= Pred(c1, c3, hs0), hs0 = hs0)
  equid(hs0)
  predeq123(c0, c1, c2, c3, hs0, hs0)
  simpr(c0 = c1, c2 = c3)
  simpl(c0 = c1, c2 = c3)

  nfne(s0, cv(hs0), cinf(c1, c1, c0))
  nfinf(s0, c1, c1, c0)

  nfsup(s0, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), c1, c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)

blocks.name: wsucex
blocks.content: Existence theorem for well-founded successor. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jun-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: wsuccl
blocks.content: If ` X ` is a set with an ` R ` successor in ` A ` , then its well-founded successor is a member of ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jun-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Oct-2021.)
